channel.title: Failed to start process for Black Mesa.
channel.description: Help please! When I'm trying to run BM this error occures: Steam - Error Failed to start process for Black Mesa: "???????? ? ???????." (0x5)

item.title: Failed to start process for Black Mesa.
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
Apparently, 0x5 means “access denied”, which means the Windows user you are logged in as doesn’t have enough permissions to access the game’s files. Try running the game as administrator (at least once), or uninstall and reinstall the game, or create another Steam Library on a drive/location other than the main library in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps… and install Black Mesa there.

Read full topic
item.source: Failed to start process for Black Mesa.

The cool kids call it

[/size]
